list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Refactor: 1. Moved getcoremodulesforstudent from DatabaseConnection.java to DataLoader.java. 2. Removed DatabaseConnection.java. 3. Updated DatabaseHandler.java with correct information. 4. Updated Login.java to reference DatabaseHandler.java instead of DatabaseConnection.java. 5. Updated RecommendationController.java to reference DatabaseHandler.java instead of DatabaseConnection.java.
Loading studentID: 1. Modified RecordCreator.java to store current studentID. - Created two static methods to set and get id.
2. Updated LoginController.java to set the value of currentstudenID
3. Modified RecommendationController.java to use current student id rather than test version.
